EmailTemplate.name: Last Will - No % given
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Will - No % given
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We are writing to notify you that your recent order for a Last Will and Testament is on hold. As soon as you contact us to clarify the following problem, we can complete your order.
This document requires 100% of your Estate be accounted for in the Principal Distribution and Alternate Principal Heirs Clauses. These sections distribute your property as percentages of your overall Estate. Currently, your document does not account for a full 100% of your Estate.
To correct this problem, please contact me or log back into www.legalzoom.com with your username and password and reopen order #XXXXXXXX to adjust the percentages distributed to each beneficiary to total exactly 100%.
If you have any additional questions, simply reply to this email or call us toll-free at 1-888-821-7574. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
